meanings.definition: A piece of material hung to cover a window, stage, etc.
meanings.sent1: The curtaining in the theater added a touch of elegance to the stage.
meanings.sent2: I need to buy new curtaining for my bedroom windows.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat got tangled in the curtaining and created chaos in the room.
meanings.sent4: The morning light peeked through the curtaining, casting a warm glow in the room.
meanings.sent5: The velvet curtaining in the old mansion was so luxurious that it felt like touching a cloud.

meanings.definition: The act of providing or fitting with curtains.
meanings.sent1: Her curtaining of the entire house was done with precision and care.
meanings.sent2: The curtaining of the stage was completed just in time for the performance.
meanings.sent3: The magician's curtaining of the illusion left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent4: The curtaining of the room with fairy lights created a magical atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: His curtaining of the window with heavy drapes blocked out all the sunlight.
